to-dos.description: Make yam and egg for Daddy and Tito before going to school.Tito wants scrambled eggs.There shouldnt be too much salt in daddy's eggs.Tito wants to complete her assignment while i make breakfast.

Plan and prepare a healthy meal for the week. This includes researching recipes, making a grocery list, and shopping for ingredients. Consider dietary restrictions and preferences, and aim to include a variety of fruits and vegetables.
Create a budget to track your income and expenses. This includes identifying my financial goals, categorizing expenses, and setting up a system for tracking spending.

Study sensor design principles, signal processing, and system implementation. This includes understanding the fundamentals of sensor technology, including sensor types, calibration, and data analysis. Explore advanced sensor technologies, such as MEMS and nanotechnology, and investigate their applications in various industries.

to-dos.task: Research Electronic and Electrical Engineering Applications
to-dos.description: Investigate current trends and advancements in electronic and electrical engineering solutions for the oil and gas industry. This includes exploring the use of sensors, automation, and control systems to improve efficiency, safety, and productivity. Identify potential areas for innovation and improvement, and research existing technologies and methodologies used in the industry.
Organize your workspace to improve productivity and reduce stress. which includes decluttering my desk, filing away documents, and setting up a comfortable and ergonomic workspace.

Plan a vacation to relax and recharge.researching destinations, booking flights and accommodations, and planning activities. A well-planned vacation will help me unwind, explore new places, and create lasting memories.

Plan a workout routine to improve physical health and fitness. This includes setting fitness goals, researching exercise routines, and scheduling workouts. A well-planned workout routine can help me stay motivated, track my progress, and achieve my fitness goals.
